annotations:
Dear sir / Prathap,
Good day,
Pls find the below tanker vsls from our direct owners and offer suitable biz,
1)  MT tbn-1 18000 dwt/2012 blt open south china ely sept (cpp)
can try voyage and tc
2)   MT tbn-2 26000 dwt/2023 blt - cpp
open wci 1h oct 2024，looking for cargo to straits/med/sea or pg area
3)  MT tbn-3  2005 built 69k dwt (dpp)
can try tc 12months with ely of sept. open india – pg
4)  MT tbn-4  cpp
46k dwt/2003  opening ely  sept in taman
5)  MT tbn – 5 cpp
50000 mt dwt/ 2009 blt
Opening 1st sept yosu.
Thanks & Best Regards,
Prathap Saminathan
Trinity Ship Brokers Ltd
MOB: +971 58 239 0168
E: tankers@trinity-ship.com
Skype: live:.cid.4554b46acc110d13
W: www.trinity-ship.com
Address: No.105,Fortune tower,Cluster C,
Jumeirah lake towers,Dubai.
BIMCO Member  ID 182184
Please print this email only if necessary. Go green! It’s good for your business and good for the planet.
